dmca.title: Problem with a Client
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: Jennifer Magee [mailto:enchantedfairydreamz@gmail.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2006 7:17 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Problem with a Client




 

My name is Jennifer Magee, I am a victim of this lady who is a reseller of
this company. She has got a bunch of emails posted on her site that were
private between me and her to show everyone but the worse part is I have
other websites in my signature that are being shown for other businesses
that had nothing to do with this and she is defaming innocent sites and is
refusing to take them down, I emailed her today and the companies have
emailed her yet she still has them up. I believe this illegal and unethical
to defame innoncent sites and asking for you to take her site off since she
will not comply.  She has also been using her tag board and putting my name
and linking it to my site with fake tags to make it look like it was me
posting the info. 

Thank you for your Time,

 

Jennifer Magee

 

 

 <http://www.diddledazzledesigns.com/emails.html>
http://www.diddledazzledesigns.com/emails.html

Lineart from various
<http://www.enchantedfairydreamz.com/mymemberships1.html> Memberships

Some Tubes from  <http://www.tenderteddytags.com/> Tender Teddy Tags
<http://www.lilave.com/> Lil Ave
